name: Tiger Survivors
description:
Tiger Survivors

Can you defend the retro handheld Tiger system from various tiger-based enemies? Probably, but for how long?!

Best played in full-screen

To start the game, hit SPACE to zoom in then R

Note: Controller not supported

Zoom/PauseSpaceManual AttackWASDUp/Down/Left/RightPower Attacks
1, 2, 3Reset GameR
